hero.title: Kawiarnia Fabryczna
hero.subtitle: Specialty Coffee in the Heart of Warsaw

about.title: About Us
about.story: Kawiarnia Fabryczna is a unique place in the center of Warsaw, where industrial climate meets passion for coffee. We are located in the historic Wola district, in a building with a rich factory heritage.
about.mission: Our mission is to serve the best specialty coffee, prepared with attention to every detail. We work with the best roasters to provide you with exceptional taste experiences.
about.atmosphere: Industrial decor with brick walls, vintage furniture and warm lighting creates a cozy atmosphere, perfect for work, meetings with friends or a moment of relaxation with your favorite coffee.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.coffeeDesc: Highest quality specialty coffee prepared by experienced baristas. Espresso, cappuccino, flat white, pour over and many other brewing methods.
menu.foodDesc: Fresh breakfasts, toasts, scrambled eggs, granola with yogurt. Perfect combination with our coffee for a good start to the day.
menu.pastriesDesc: Fresh croissants, cookies, cakes and desserts. Everything prepared daily by local bakers.
menu.drinksDesc: Teas, freshly squeezed juices, lemonades and plant-based drinks. Something for everyone looking for an alternative to coffee.
